about.name: Leul Chanie
about.title: Software Developer
about.subTitle: I build mobile and web applications that deliver seamless experiences.
about.description: Hello! I'm Leul Chanie, a Software Developer specializing in Next.js, React, Django, and Flutter. With three years of experience in React and a strong foundation in JavaScript, I'm currently expanding my expertise in TypeScript. I build scalable, user-friendly applications that solve real-world problems.
about.quote: Live the Life as you want

timeline.summary: Contributed to the development of a new social networking platform targeting niche communities.
bulletPoints: Developed scalable backend services using Python and Django framework.
Implemented user authentication and authorization using OAuth 2.0 and JWT tokens.
Designed and optimized database schemas for performance and scalability.
Implemented real-time messaging features using WebSockets and Redis.
Worked closely with frontend developers to design APIs and ensure smooth integration with the frontend.

timeline.summary: Played a key backend role in building a full-stack web platform for IT infrastructure management.
bulletPoints: Developed scalable RESTful APIs using Django and Django REST Framework.
Integrated React frontend components with Django-based backend endpoints.
Implemented user authentication, role-based access, and token management.
Optimized database models and queries to improve system performance.
Collaborated with frontend developers and designers to align on API contracts and UX requirements.

timeline.summary: Developed immersive and responsive frontend features for a digital product platform using modern React-based tools.
bulletPoints: Built dynamic, SEO-friendly pages with Next.js and React.
Implemented fluid animations and micro-interactions using GSAP and Framer Motion.
Collaborated closely with UI/UX designers to translate designs into high-quality code.
Optimized application performance and accessibility for diverse devices.
Created reusable components and maintained consistent design systems across the app.

timeline.summary: Played a key role in developing a data analytics platform for a diverse range of clients.
bulletPoints: Developed RESTful APIs and integrated third-party services to ingest and process large volumes of data.
Designed and implemented responsive user interfaces using React.js and Bootstrap.
Worked closely with data scientists to integrate machine learning models into the platform.
Optimized database queries and improved overall system performance.
Conducted unit tests and participated in peer code reviews to ensure code quality.

timeline.summary: Worked as a full-stack developer building scalable web applications using Django REST Framework, Next.js, Prisma, and both MongoDB and PostgreSQL in a hybrid architecture.
bulletPoints: Developed RESTful APIs using Django REST Framework and integrated them with modern frontend interfaces.
Built dynamic and SEO-friendly pages using Next.js and React.
Used Prisma ORM with both PostgreSQL and MongoDB for flexible and efficient data management.
Designed database schemas and optimized queries for performance and scalability.
Collaborated across cross-functional teams to deliver production-ready features on time.
Design and build full website
Optimized Site
SEO implemented

myskills.TechStack: Next.js, React, JavaScript (ES6+), TypeScript (learning), Tailwind CSS, Redux
Strength: Optimizing frontend performance for speed and efficiency
Implementing state management with Redux and React Context

myskills.TechStack: Django, Django REST Framework, PostgreSQL, Prisma, MongoDb,MYsql

Strength: Optimizing mobile app performance and responsiveness
Integrating backend services with Firebase and REST APIs

projects.title: Urban Build
projects.description: This project is built entirely with Next.js and React, ensuring fast performance and smooth navigation .Tailwind CSS is used for responsive, modern styling across devices.Interactive elements like animations and accordions are powered by Framer Motion and ShadCN UI components

projects.title: Adwa
projects.description: A culturally-inspired graphic design project that fuses the iconic symbol of Adwa with modern AI artistry and fluid web animations. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and powered by Vite for lightning-fast development.

projects.title: Learnify
projects.description: Learnify is a modern frontend for an online learning platform, built with React.js, styled using TailwindCSS, and enhanced with smooth, engaging transitions via Framer Motion. It delivers a responsive, accessible, and interactive user experience optimized for learners on all devices.

projects.title: ET-Driving Quiz App
projects.description: ET-Driving Quiz App is a mobile application built with Flutter that helps users in Ethiopia prepare for their driving license exams. The app offers a user-friendly interface with localized content, practice quizzes, and educational resources aligned with Ethiopian driving regulations.

projects.title: Injoy Burger
projects.description: Injoy Burger is a responsive and visually engaging fast food landing page built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The website is designed to showcase a fictional burger restaurant with a modern layout, attractive imagery, and smooth interactivity to entice visitors and promote food offerings.

projects.title: Luda-Art
projects.description: Luda-Art is a visually engaging single-page web application built with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and GSAP (GreenSock Animation Platform). The primary focus of this project is to demonstrate advanced scroll-based animations, providing a smooth and interactive user experience.

services.name: Mobile App Development
services.desc: I craft intuitive, high-performance mobile applications that elevate your brand and keep users engaged on the go. From concept to interface, I deliver smooth, scalable solutions tailored to your needs.

services.name: Web App Development
services.desc: I build custom web applications tailored to your business goals fast, scalable, and user-focused. From landing pages to complex dashboards, I turn ideas into interactive, real-world solutions.

services.name: UI/UX Solutions
services.desc: I design modern, intuitive interfaces that balance aesthetics with usability. Every interaction is crafted to drive engagement and ensure a seamless user experience.

services.name: Web Animation
services.desc: I bring interfaces to life with smooth animations and reusable components. Using GSAP, Framer Motion, and modern JavaScript, I build interactive frontends that captivate and perform.

testimonials.name: Ephrem Adane
testimonials.review: I had the pleasure of collaborating with Leul on several full-stack and front-end projects in Addis Ababa. His deep understanding of technologies like React, Next.js, and Django REST was pivotal to the success of our projects. His passion for clean code and innovative design made him an indispensable part of our team.

testimonials.name: David Rodriguez
testimonials.review: Leul consistently impressed us with his expertise in React, Next.js, and Prisma. His seamless integration of backend and frontend technologies created smooth, high-performance applications. His ability to work under pressure while maintaining clear communication made him an invaluable team member.

testimonials.name: Emily Chen
testimonials.review: Leul brought an exceptional level of professionalism and creativity to the table. Whether it was developing dynamic React components or ensuring smooth user interactions with Next.js, his work always exceeded expectations. His collaboration and openness to feedback made him a great team player.

testimonials.name: Michael Lee
testimonials.review: Leul is a versatile developer who contributed significantly to both front-end and back-end aspects of our projects. His skills in React, Next.js, and Django REST frameworks were essential for building scalable and efficient solutions. His keen attention to detail and problem-solving ability is highly commendable.

testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.review: Leul's work on both the backend with Django and frontend using React was crucial to the project’s success. His ability to merge functionality with design, ensuring both usability and performance, sets him apart. He always goes the extra mile to make sure everything runs smoothly. Highly recommended for full-stack development.
